articles.title: Ask the remodeler: Maintaining your fireplace during the holiday season
articles.description:
From wood-burning to gas, here are some safety tips to keep in mind before lighting a roaring fire this holiday season.

The post Ask the remodeler: Maintaining your fireplace during the holiday season appeared first on Boston.com.
